```{r setup, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, include=FALSE}
# Libraries

library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(kableExtra)
library(bookdown)
library(ggplot2)
library(stringr)
library(lubridate)
```


```{r read-data}
# Read the data
data <- read.csv(file = 
                   "Data/koalabase-1996-2017.csv")%>%
  mutate(Call.Date = dmy(Call.Date),
         Year = year(Call.Date),
         Month = month(Call.Date),
         Day = day(Call.Date)) %>% 
  separate(Adult.Size, 
           c("Phase", "Size"),"\\(")

data$Size <-
  gsub(")","",as.character(data$Size))

```
